biotools.summary: Web-based text mining tool that extracts and incorporates comprehensive knowledge about ubiquitin-protein ligases (E3) with their underlying mechanisms. This tool integrates available E3 data from the published literature as well as from the biological databases.

bioschemas.name: E3Miner
bioschemas.summary: Web-based text mining tool that extracts and incorporates comprehensive knowledge about ubiquitin-protein ligases (E3) with their underlying mechanisms. This tool integrates available E3 data from the published literature as well as from the biological databases.
